overview_of_class:
Field methods in stratigraphy and sedimentology; interpretation of depositional systems, facies models, and sequence stratigraphy based on field observations. Continuation of Earth 330; 3.5 week field trip
to Colorado/Utah in late August to mid-September, returning in time for fall classes.
name: Field Problems in Sedimentary Geology
title: WCAS EARTH 331-0-1 Field Problems in Sedimentary Geology
